Pre-Game Insights: The Padres will try to keep their three-game home win streak intact when they take on the Tigers.
The matchup Thursday is the third time these teams square off this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres have the sixth-ranked team ERA in the NL at 3.99.
The Tigers have the fifth-best team ERA in the majors at 3.75.
Jurickson Profar has 24 doubles, 21 home runs and 81 RBI for the Padres.
Jackson Merrill is 14-for-38 with two doubles, four home runs and 11 RBI over the last 10 games.
Riley Greene has 24 doubles, five triples and 20 home runs while hitting.256 for the Tigers.
Spencer Torkelson is 9-for-35 with a double and three home runs over the past 10 games.
The Padres are 80-61 overall and 39-32 in home games.
The Tigers are 70-70 overall and 35-36 in road games.
Others: The line for the game is Padres -156, Tigers +132; over/under is 8 1/2 runs.

The injuries for the Padres include Stephen Kolek, Ha-Seong Kim, and Luis Patino, while the injuries for the Tigers include Alex Faedo, Javier Baez, Wenceel Perez, Brendan White, Reese Olson, and Sawyer Gipson-Long.
